gateway._comment: Token for authenticating with OpenClaw gateway. Will be auto-detected if possible.

aws._comment: AWS configuration for S3 storage and Bedrock models (optional)

scout._comment: Scout Engine for opportunity discovery. Add your Brave Search API key and custom queries.

_comments.workspace: Path to OpenClaw workspace. Auto-detected if not specified.
_comments.skillsPath: Path to skills directory. Auto-detected from workspace if not specified.
_comments.memoryPath: Path to memory directory. Auto-detected from workspace if not specified.
